name: Lights on Lights off!
description:
A game made for the Global Game Jam 2022 based on the theme "Duality"

The flame light will soon fade out... Use it wisely to help the Lego escape out! Controls: AWSD or Arrow keys to move. How many times will you die before reaching the final level? Try to beat my score which is.... hmmm... you will know it at the end. Have fun :)

Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/DerghamGames

IG: https://www.instagram.com/dergham.games/

Global Game Jam game page: https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/lights-lights-3
